card_web.title: Web Design
card_web.description: Creation of modern, responsive, and visually appealing websites, focused on performance, usability, and personalized visual identity.

card_api.title: API Development
card_api.description: Building robust and scalable APIs for servers, integrating databases and providing secure and efficient endpoints for web and mobile applications.

card_data.title: Database
card_data.description: Modeling, implementation, and optimization of relational and non-relational databases, ensuring data integrity, security, and high performance.
